name: Xelenium, Security Testing with Selenium
short_description:
Hello Everyone,

Warm Greetings!!!

Xelenium has become part of OWASP and you can find more information about Xelenium here: https://www.owasp.org/index.php/OWASP_Xelenium_Project

I have detailed about the steps to follow in OWASP page of Xelenium. Please have that as a reference and reach me out for any clarifications.

I would require your support and feedback in proceeding forward. Hope you would support my humble effort by providing your feedback and enhancement requests.

We have launched our website here: www.xelenium.org, and this website will act as an official website of xelenium going forward. 

Please make use of this website for issue reporting and for enhancements requests.

Thanks!

Disclaimer:

You should only use this software to test the security of your own web application or to test with the consent of the web site’s owner. I will not take any responsibility of the problems that arise out of using Xelenium against any application.
